alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Jasper (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 1:53PM CDT until July 05 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Jasper County in east central Mississippi... Southwestern Clarke County in east central Mississippi... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 153 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Barnett, or 14 miles west of Quitman, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Barnett around 205 PM CDT. Stafford Springs around 210 PM CDT. Goodwater around 220 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
